basic.Target Organism: [Ref.33291521] Gram-positive bacteria:S. aureus(MIC / MBC = 1.6-3.1μM / 3.1μM), B. subtilis(MIC / MBC = 12.5μM / 12.5μM), S. mutans(MIC / MBC = 6.2μM /  6.2μM), MRSA(MIC / MBC = 3.1μM / 3.1μM), MRSA-1(MIC /MBC = 6.2μM / 6.2μM), MRSA-2(MIC / MBC = 3.1μM / 12.5μM), MRSA-3(MIC / MBC = 6.2μM / 12.5μM)Gram-negative bacteria:E. coli(MIC / MBC = 3.1μM / 3.1μM),  D31(MIC /MBC = 12.5μM / 25μM), P. aeruginosa(MIC / MBC > 50μM / 50μM), PAO1(MIC / MBC = 6.2μM / 12.5μM)Fungi:C. albicans(MIC / MBC = 12.5μM / 12.5μM)
